wel: Welcome to Pizzeria San Giovanni! Our restaurant is a piece of Italy in the heart of Poland. We prepare dishes that will transport you to the sunny coasts of Italy. From crispy focaccia, through authentic pizzas, to creamy Semifreddo - each dish is created with passion and the finest Italian ingredients. Join us on our culinary journey and experience the true taste of Italy!
